title: The Nearness of You
description: Autumn has been in love with her best friend Charlie her whole life. On her 30th birthday, she decides that things need to change between them.Autumn then meets Blake and her love life gets complicated. Suddenly, lies are told and feelings are hurt, and Autumn is left with things more complicated then they ever were when she was alone. The Nearness of You is a novella with some adult content. Mature readers only.
author: Anne Fallon
